Finding something you weren't looking for - and at a great price too!</field></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GTE</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">randBumber</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.6</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">In the hardest times, hope is something you give yourself and that is a sign of inner strength.</field></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF2"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">randBumber</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.2</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO2"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Sometimes life is like a dark, dark tunnel. You constantly have the feeling that you'll never see a light at the end, but if you keep going nicely, you might get to a nicer place.</field></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">After Ba Sing Se is freed from tyranny, I will first take back my tea store. Then I will play Pai Sho from morning to night - every day.</field></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
